document.full_text: news corp has held talks to give control of myspace to the music label-owned video site vevo.com, but the likelihood of a deal being reached was slim, a person with knowledge of the talks said.
document.title: news corp in talks with vevo on myspace: source
lines_and_colors: news corp has held talks to give control of myspace to the music label-owned video site vevo.com, but the likelihood of a deal being reached was slim, a person with knowledge of the talks said.
